issue.title: [Rust] builder benchmark is broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4282](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4282). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This benchmark uses `push_slice` which has been renamed to `append_slice`

comments.body:
